name: NigerianNews
0:
”Alexa, ask Nigerian News for headlines”
”Alexa, ask Nigerian News for Banking and Finance news”
”Alexa, Ask Nigerian News for Super Eagles news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nigerian news
des:
You can get news of interest to Nigerians and even topic specific news for the following topics: Afrobeats, Nollywood, the Super Eagles, Agriculture, Banking and Finance, Party Politics, Police and Crime, and the Military.

To use this skill, start by invoking the skill:
"Alexa, open Nigerian News."

To get the latest news, just say:
"Read today's news"

To get topic specific news, just say: "Read " and then the topic name.
So, to read Banking and Finance News, say: "Read Banking and Finance News"

All the topics are listed above. 

"Nigerian News" is the voice interface for news section Asorock.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
